inclusion.criterion: diagnostic laparoscopy with suspected acute appendicitis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at Odense University Hospital (OUH) or Svendborg
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: courses that the generalizability to patients under 18 is not possible
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen, accompanied by nausea and vomiting. He was febrile with tenderness, rebound tenderness and guarding on palpation.
